verses.name: John 16:28
verses.text: I came forth from the Father, and am come into the world: again, I leave the world, and go to the Father.

verses.name: John 16:29
verses.text: His disciples said unto him, Lo, now speakest thou plainly, and speakest no proverb.

verses.name: John 16:30
verses.text: Now are we sure that thou knowest all things, and needest not that any man should ask thee: by this we believe that thou camest forth from God.

verses.name: John 16:31
verses.text: Jesus answered them, Do ye now believe?
